contentrichtext.text: '''George Ives''' may refer to: * [[George Cecil Ives]] (1867–1950), German-British poet, writer, penal reformer and early gay rights campaigner * [[George Edward Ives]] (1845–1894), American musician and father of [[Charles Ives]] * [[George Frederick Ives]] (1881–1993), Canadian, last surviving veteran of the Second Boer War * [[George Homer Ives]] (1836–1863), American bandit and villain * [[George Ives (actor)]] (born 1922), American actor ==See also== * [[Ives]], a surname {{hndis|name=Ives, George}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Ives, George}}
